system.requirements: Origin Path: Lure of the Void
system.descriptionText:
1. Recidivist: Gain Enemy (Adeptus Arbites) and Resistance (Interrogation) Talents. Gain Concealment as Trained Skill.
2. Free-Thinker: +3 Intelligence or +3 Perception, -3 Willpower. Gain Enemy (Ecclesiarchy) Talent.
3. Dark Visionary: Gain Dark Soul Talent and any one Trained Forbidden Lore Skill. Gain 1d5+1 Corruption or 1d5+1 Insanity.
